summary.title: Sumary
summary.name: Soniya Pal
summary.description: A passionate Frontend Developer with 7.0 years of experience, specializing in custom theme development and CMS-based solutions using HubSpot CMS, Shopify, and WordPress. Proficient in React.js, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+), SCSS, and modern UI libraries. Adept at building pixel-perfect, high-performing, and SEO-optimized websites tailored for performance and conversions. Known for translating complex requirements into intuitive user interfaces and ensuring cross-browser compatibility.
